CompMetaboTools 0.3.2
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • LC-MS feature grouping
  • Changelog

Computational Metabolomics Team Utilities

This package provides utilities commonly used in analyses of the Eurac IfB Computational Metabolomics Team. Functions found to be of particular and general usability might be later added to core packages, depending on their context, such as xcms, MSnbase, MsCoreUtils etc.
